message.name: ERR_LEGALSTATUS_FV_END_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_START_DATE
message.locale: End Date should not be earlier than Start Date.

message.name: ERR_LEGALSTATUS_FV_END_DATE_GREATER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The end date of a legal status cannot be set to a date prior to today.

message.name: ERR_LEGALSTATUS_FV_START_DATE_GREATER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: Start Date cannot be greater than current date.

message.name: ERR_LEGALSTATUS_XRV_MULTIPLEIND_FALSE
message.locale: This case type allows only one legal status to be active at a time.More than one Legal Statuses cannot be selected for this case type.

message.name: ERR_LEGALSTATUS_FV_SAME_CASETYPE
message.locale: This 'Case Type',%1s, is already selected for the Legal Status.

message.name: ERR_LEGALSTATUS_REGISTRAR_ISSUE
message.locale: Exception occurred while creating the Legal Action Hook Registrar.

message.name: ERR_LEGALSTATUS_REGISTRAR_INCORRECT_BPOCLASS
message.locale: Business Process class %1s must implement the interface %2s.

message.name: ERR_LEGALSTATUS_REGISTRAR_NEW_INSTANCE_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: Factory class %1s does not implement newInstance method.

message.name: ERR_LEGALSTATUS_FV_DUPLICATE_LEGALSTATUS
message.locale: An active Legal Status of the same type exists. Cannot create another of the same type

message.name: INF_LEGALSTATUS_LEGAL_STATUS_NOT_CONFIGURED_FOR_THIS_CASE_TYPE
message.locale: No types of Legal Status have been administratively configured for this type of case.

message.name: ERR_LEGALSTATUS_XRV_START_DATE_OR_END_DATE_OF_LEGAL_STATUS_MUST_NOT_BE_GREATER_THAN_END_DATE_OF_CASE_MEMBER
message.locale: The member selected has an end date of [%1s] - legal status can only be added for the selected member during the period they are active on the case.

message.name: ERR_LEGALSTATUS_FV_LEGALSTATUS_CAN_NOT_BE_ADDED_FOR_DELETED_CASE_MEMBER
message.locale: Legal status can not be added for the deleted/canceled case members.
Legal status can not be added for the deleted/cancelled case members.
